channel.title: CVE Feed for Zerochannel -- 0ch BBS Script
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zerochannel -- 0ch BBS Script

item.title: CVE-2024-28126|2024-03-26T09:57:42.200Z -- zerochannel -- 0ch%20bbs%20script
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in 0ch BBS Script ver.4.00. An arbitrary script may be executed on the web browser of the user accessing the website that uses the product. Note that the developer was unreachable, therefore, users should consider stop using 0ch BBS Script ver.4.00.
